text: Lev Fyodorovich Mikhaylov (; 26 April 1938 – 31 August 2004) was a Soviet figure skater. He was a five-time Soviet national champion and placed in the top ten at four European Championships. Mikhaylov began skating at an outdoor rink. He was coached by Georgy Felitsyn and was a member of DSO Spartak and CSK Moscow. After retiring from competition, he worked as a coach. His students included Tatiana Nemtsova and Elena Kotova. ==Results== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! style="background-color: #ffdead; " colspan=10 align=center | International |- !
